rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.title: Linking disease control programmes in rural Africa: A pro-poor strategy to reach Abuja targets and millennium development goals
rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.description: The effectiveness of programmes to tackle malaria could be improved by linking them to initiatives to prevent other diseases.
